kubejs.ponder.tag.natures_aura.descripti: Using the surrounding aura to great effect
kubejs.ponder.birth_spirit.text_1: Breeding animals in an area with high levels of Aura has a chance to drop a Spirit of Birthing.
kubejs.ponder.birthing_altar.text_4: Place the Birthing Altar in the center
kubejs.ponder.brilliant_fiber.text_1: Leaves will start to be converted to Golden Leaves
kubejs.ponder.brilliant_fiber.text_2: Break to collect the Golden Leaves
kubejs.ponder.crimson_altar.text_1: If the Natural Altar is built in the nether, it transforms into the Crimson Altar.
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge.text_5: Place down a Smithing Table in the center
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge.text_6: This area must be clear for the transformation
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge2.text_1: Darkstone Pedestals can be placed like so, they hold items for the ritual
kubejs.ponder.heph_forge2.text_2: Arcane Crystal Obelisks can be placed in the same spaces and passively generate Aureal
kubejs.ponder.natural_altar.text_5: Place the Natural Altar in the center.
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_1: Place down the Offering Table, with flowers of any type around it.
kubejs.ponder.offering_table.text_2: Place the ingredent inside the Altar, then drop the Spirit of Calling to complete the craft.
kubejs.ponder.ritual_of_the_forest.text_: Place the Wooden Stands like so, they will hold items required for crafting
Place the Gold Powder around the center for each ritual.
Place the required Sapling in the center.
kubejs.ponder.soul_extractor.text_1: Use the Soul Extractor on Soul Sand.
